ygData.subject: Re: Hi all
ygData.msgSnippet: ... quite fun on TP. You know of any guilds who d take someone that low? ... hello. I ... got ... I play on TP sometimes as well.  Look for a group of 4 or 5
ygData.messageBody:
--- In EverQuest@y..., "The Mad Macinchaote" <scendera@v...> wrote:
> I'll be by sometime...I've got a 15 Ikky shaman who's looking to be
quite fun on TP. You know of any guilds who'd take someone that low?
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: nadenu1
> To: EverQuest@y...
> Sent: Wednesday, June 12, 2002 10:04 AM
> Subject: [EverQuest] Hi all
>
>
> I've been reading the posts for a while and thought I'd say
hello. I
> play on the Tholuxe Paells server. My main is a 44 druid and I've
got
> quite a few little alts too. If anyone is on TP, look me up. :)
>
> Nadenu Willowmist

I play on TP sometimes as well. Look for a group of 4 or 5 Trolls on
Sunday afternoons, that's us. We are an awesome sight! We're too
small to be our own guild and too casual for most other guilds. But
we do share resources, including our alts, so we do well.

My alt is an Inky Necro that just finished the newbie armor quests.

As you can see, I'm an evil kind of guy on TP.

We'll be ravaging the Lake Rathe zone for a few weeks. Stop by and
shout encouraging or derogatory words!
